body.p:
Midway Ky July 16th 1861
To Hon B Magoffin
Govr of Ky

We the undersigned Citizens of the county of Woodford state of Ky -- Would Respectfully Represent -- That on 13th Inst -- Jas F. Graves and Joel H Sheets of this place being Engaged in a Rencounter -- and that while so Engaged -- Nelson Graves son of the said Jas F Graves (aged 14 years) being present did assault the said J H Sheets with a stone (not however inflicting material injury) for which offence the said Nelson Graves was arranged before Justice Saml Clinton and fined the sum of nine dollars ($9.00) and costs -- now the undersigned would Respectfully pray your "Hon,,' to Remit the whole or so much of said fine as may be compatible with the obligations of your office believing that the said youth ^was^ a in the matter by that natural solicitude which as son would feel under the circumstances -- And your petitioners will ever pray &c
